name: io.github.codacy/codacy-mcp-server
description: MCP Server for the Codacy API, enabling access to repositories, files, quality, coverage, security and more.

tools.name: codacy_list_organization_repositories
tools.description: List repositories in an organization with pagination support.

tools.name: codacy_search_organization_srm_items
tools.description: Primary tool to list security items/issues/vulnerabilities/findings related to organization security and risk management (SRM).

tools.name: codacy_search_repository_srm_items
tools.description: Tool to search security items in a repository.

tools.name: codacy_list_repository_issues
tools.description: Lists and filters code quality issues in a repository.

tools.name: codacy_list_repository_pull_requests
tools.description: List pull requests from a repository that the user has access to.

tools.name: codacy_list_files
tools.description: List files in a repository with pagination support.

tools.name: codacy_get_file_issues
tools.description: Get the issue list for a file in a repository.

tools.name: codacy_get_file_coverage
tools.description: Get coverage information for a file in the head commit of a repository branch.

tools.name: codacy_get_pull_request_files_coverage
tools.description: Get diff coverage information for all files in a pull request.

tools.name: codacy_get_pull_request_git_diff
tools.description: Returns the human-readable Git diff of a pull request.

tools.name: codacy_list_pull_request_issues
tools.description: Returns a list of issues found in a pull request.

tools.name: codacy_get_repository_with_analysis
tools.description: Get repository with analysis data.

tools.name: codacy_get_file_with_analysis
tools.description: Get file with analysis data.

tools.name: codacy_get_file_clones
tools.description: Get the list of duplication clones for a file in a repository.

tools.name: codacy_get_repository_pull_request
tools.description: Get repository pull request details.

tools.name: codacy_get_issue
tools.description: Get details of a specific issue.

tools.name: codacy_get_pattern
tools.description: Get pattern details.

tools.name: codacy_list_repository_tool_patterns
tools.description: List patterns for repository tools.

tools.name: codacy_list_tools
tools.description: List available tools.

tools.name: codacy_list_repository_tools
tools.description: List tools for a repository.

tools.name: codacy_list_organizations
tools.description: List organizations.

tools.name: codacy_cli_analyze
tools.description: Uses Codacy's command-line tool to analyze code.
